title: I Want to Help My Daughter Grieve Her Brother's Death
description:
Lynn's son died of a drug overdose, and she's not sure how to help herself and her daughter get through the pain of the loss. - Dr. Laura: "We cope better through the ugly parts of life when we're honest with ourselves."
